item.title: Workshop on competitive examinations
item.description:
<![CDATA[Assistant Commissioner of Raichur Sub-Division Gajanan Bale has appealed to those interested to make use of a workshop on competitive examinations.
He was addressing a press conference in Raichur on Friday.
Mr. Bale said that a workshop would be conducted at Pandit Siddaram Jambaladinni Ranga Mandira in Raichur on February 11 to guide candidates appearing for IAS, KAS, PSI, PDO, RRB, and SSC examinations.
â€œSubject experts and officers will guide the candidates participating in the workshop. T...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Take steps to tackle drinking water crisis during summer, Raichur ZP CEO tells officials
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur Zilla Panchayat Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Rahul Tukaram Pandwe has directed officials of the departments concerned to tackle drinking water problem in the district.
He was addressing a meeting held in Raichur on Thursday. The district has seven taluks with 1,438 inhabited areas in 179 gram panchayats. Of the 1,438 inhabited areas, 297 villages are getting drinking water through lakes, drawing water from the Narayanapur Right Branch Canal, and apart from that, rural areas are getting...]]>
